titles: A letter to a friend relating to the present convocation at Westminster
author: Prideaux, Humphrey, 1648-1724.
Kidder, Richard, 1633-1703.
Tillotson, John, 1630-1694.
notes: Attributed to Humphrey Prideaux by Wing, and by others to Richard Kidder and John Tillotson.
Reproduction of original in Duke University Library.
